title: Subscribe
text:
All of the good stuff is in the SLAM DUNK DISCORD server.
Subscribe today to get the best rate!
(And don’t do it through iOS if you can avoid it, Apple will charge you an extra fee.)

title: Slam Dunk
text:
Welcome to Slam Dunk!
Sportsbooks are evil and want you to make bad decisions. Slam Dunk arms you with the best tools to make better decisions!
We have the best data and analysis for first basket NBA props, including:

First basket (field goal or points)
First basket by team
First basket exact methods
Player to win the tipoff
First team to score (and exact methods)
Player to NOT score first

We’ve been using ML and AI to identify the best picks since sports betting apps were legalized. We’re always adding new books and prop markets to our tools and projections.

Set limits, and gamble responsibly!
Gambling is addictive, including sports betting, and if you or someone you know is suffering from the consequences of problem gambling, don’t wait to get help.

title: About
text:
Slam Dunk is a group of data professionals (scientists, engineers, analysts) who were working together in day jobs when sports betting was legalized in Illinois.
We built a set of tools to pull data from the NBA and use it to train models to predict the probability of events in NBA games.
We also developed tools that check the odds at sportsbooks to identify plays where our models suggest an edge, and then alert us when edges appear.
It turns out, the sportsbooks don’t like it when you win a lot, and so they’ve done their best to limit our accounts. Slam Dunk is our way attempt to make them regret that decision!
